homeHeader.title: Company Formation in Abu Dhabi Free Zone Made Simple — Launch, Scale & Grow With Confidence
homeHeader.description: Complicated documentation, unclear approvals, and legal hurdles often delay business setup in the UAE. At One Nexuz, we take the stress away with a completely Free Zone business setup in Abu Dhabi. With its strong infrastructure and global connectivity, the Abu Dhabi Free Zone serves as a launchpad for startups, SMEs, and corporates. Our experts make company formation in Abu Dhabi Free Zone fast, compliant, and hassle-free — so you focus on growth while we handle the red tape.

leftSection_3.title: One Nexuz Gets You Matched With the Right Legal Structure in Abu Dhabi Free Zone
leftSection_3.description: Abu Dhabi Free Zones boast countless company structures to meet your long-term business goals, including:

items.title: Free Zone Establishment
items.description: Ideal for single-shareholder entities, an FZE provides solopreneurs and freelancers full operational control.

items.title: Branch of a Foreign Company
items.description: Expand your existing overseas business into the UAE’s fastest-growing city by registering your parent company’s branch.

items.title: Free Zone Company
items.description: Perfect for startups, partnerships, and group companies, an FZC offers businesses a multi-shareholder setup.

leftSection_5.title: Our 6-Step Process to Launch Your Abu Dhabi Business

items.title: Book an Initial Consultation
items.description: Our expert consultants take time to understand your business goals, assess suitable Abu Dhabi Free Zone options, and guide you in selecting from 1,200+ business activities while ensuring full compliance.

items.title: Choose the Right Legal Structure
items.description: Once your business activity is finalized, we help you select the ideal structure—whether FZC or FZE— apply for a license, and bundle up to 10 business activities, perfect for companies with multiple revenue streams.

items.title: Find Your Ideal Workspace
items.description: We assist in securing the right office solution for your needs—from flexi desks and coworking spaces to virtual or fully equipped offices. Whether you want to book, rent, or lease, we ensure your workspace matches your business model.

items.title: Secure Your Visa
items.description: We collect and process your documents to obtain the relevant license and visas. With access to 5+ visas, you can sponsor family members and hire international talent. Residency visas for owners and employees are also included, making relocation and team expansion seamless.

items.title: Open Your Bank Account
items.description: With your license in hand, we streamline the process of opening a corporate or personal bank account. Our guidance ensures faster approvals, enabling you to manage transactions, receive payments, and fully operationalize your business.

items.title: Get Ongoing PRO Support
items.description: Our support doesn’t end with company formation in Abu Dhabi. We handle renewals, compliance, and government formalities so your business remains fully compliant with UAE regulations. From license and visa renewals to ongoing PRO services, we keep your operations smooth and hassle-free.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Why set your business in the Abu Dhabi free zone?
items.answer: Expanding into this region means you can enjoy 100% foreign ownership, tax exemptions, access to talent, and improved profits.

items.question: How long does it take to set up a company in Abu Dhabi’s free zone?
items.answer: With One Nexuz, you can get your business up and running within 5 to 7 working days, including securing a trade name and license.

items.question: Can I, as an expat, own my company in the Abu Dhabi free zone?
items.answer: Yes, free zones allow you to own 100% of your business, eliminating the need for a local sponsor.

items.question: What documents do I need to kick off my company in the Abu Dhabi free zone?
items.answer: You’ll typically need a copy of your passport and visas, a passport-sized photo, a proposed business name, a certificate of incorporation (only for businesses), and a brief description of your business activity.

items.question: Can I get residency visas through my freezone Abu Dhabi company?
items.answer: Yes, most Abu Dhabi free zones allow you to apply for 1 to 5 residency visas using a company license.
